heading: HR02253
0: A RESOLUTION EXPRESSING SUPPORT FOR THE DEPARTMENT OF FINANCE'S SUSPENSION OF THE SCHEDULED HIKE ON THE FUEL EXCISE TAX FOR 2019 AND TO EXHORT THE SAME TO INCLUDE IN THE SUSPENSION THE PRESENTLY IMPOSED FUEL EXCISE TAX UNDER THE TRAIN LAW WITH THE GOAL OF PROVIDING RELIEF FOR THE POOR WHO HAS BEEN ADVERSELY AFFECTED BY SUCH TAXES AND TO FULLY REALIZE THE INTENTION OF THE DEPARTMENT OF FINANCE TO MITIGATE INFLATIONARY PRESSURES ON THE COUNTRY
status: Pending with the Committee on WAYS AND MEANS since 2018-11-12
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HR02253
FULL TITLE : A RESOLUTION EXPRESSING SUPPORT FOR THE DEPARTMENT OF FINANCE'S SUSPENSION OF THE SCHEDULED HIKE ON THE FUEL EXCISE TAX FOR 2019 AND TO EXHORT THE SAME TO INCLUDE IN THE SUSPENSION THE PRESENTLY IMPOSED FUEL EXCISE TAX UNDER THE TRAIN LAW WITH THE GOAL OF PROVIDING RELIEF FOR THE POOR WHO HAS BEEN ADVERSELY AFFECTED BY SUCH TAXES AND TO FULLY REALIZE THE INTENTION OF THE DEPARTMENT OF FINANCE TO MITIGATE INFLATIONARY PRESSURES ON THE COUNTRY
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : ALEJANO, GARY C.
DATE FILED : 2018-10-17
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON WAYS AND MEANS ON 2018-11-12
